OOC:  Well well well, if it isn t cardhead649, the punk who dared to talk
back to me when I  specifically said  no whining, yelling or complaining at
me.

OOC:  Well well well, if it isn't cardhead649, the punk who dared to talk
b=
ack to me when I  specifically said  no whining, yelling or complaining at
=
me.  Listen, you little novice, me and Hollywood Narrator have EARNED the
r=
ight to act freely here...

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 04, 2002 01:13:35 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Taking charge...

OOC: Hey, you, you piece of dog shit. You can kiss my ass and grow up. I
d=
idn't ask for your opinion ROOKIE. I've been here for since you were in
dia=
pers...

----- Original Message -----
From: cardhead649
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, August 03, 2002 7:47 AM
Subject: Re: Taking charge...


If that's the kind of CRAP you call role-playing, I'm going to ignore=20
your posts until you come up with a SERIOUS character with a SERIOUS=20
origin.  And I doubt I'll be the only one.

In case you haven't noticed, NBW is NOT supposed to be an all-out=20
jokefest.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Hollywood Narrator Countdown" <thecode@p...>=20
wrote:
> Terminion the termite Transformer is aboard his ship. He hums. He=20
paints a pretty picture of a ladybug while the ship in on auto pilot.=20
HE'S BOARDED FROM NOWHERE! He doesn't know, though. He continues=20
painting his picture, adding way too many legs and drawing an eye on=20
it's back. Finally, he ultimately decides to turn it into a picture=20
of Lisa Trevor. he finishes and screams in horror. He walks off to=20
get away from the hideous thing and makes himself a sandwich. He gets=20
chocolate mustard on his hands. He slowly turns around to wash his=20
hands and bumps right into Mincer, the Subaru Forester!
>=20
> Mincer: Hi.
>=20
> Terminion: Hey, you got the highest score in the crash tests!
>=20
> Mincer: Yeah, I know.
>=20
> Terminion: DANNY!
>=20
> Danny the guy that changes into the tarantula walks in. He sighs.
>=20
> Danny: Of all of the names in the Transformers universe.
>=20
> He walks up and stares at Mincer. Mincer stares back.
>=20
> Danny: Draw.
>=20
> Mincer draws a pretty picture of a butterfly.
>=20
> Danny: Nicely done. What's your name?
>=20
> Mincer: I'm Mincer.
>=20
> Danny: I'm Danny, sad as it is.
>=20
> Mincer: I already knew that, though.
>=20
> Terminion: My name is Terminion.
>=20
> Mincer: Nice! Let's dance!
>=20
> He dances. Terminion and Danny stare.
>=20
> Terminion: No.
>=20
> Danny: Dude, you obviously have blown some gaskets.
>=20
> Mincer: Gaskets?
>=20
> Danny: You sssssick ffffffreak! Get off of our ship!
>=20
> Mincer: Why? I brought a friend so we can party! Meet my friend,=20
Junk Man!
>=20
> Junk Man walks up. He knew his name was already taken by Capcom for=20
Mega Man 7 but he wasn't concerned.
>=20
> Junk Man: Hey, guys! Great day we're having! I transform into a Hot=20
Wheels Car!
>=20
> They all stare.
>=20
> Terminion: Out of my ship, man.
>=20
> Mincer: We're only looking to have fun, homes.
>=20
> Terminion cringes.
>=20
> Danny: Oh, what? Oh, yeah.
>=20
> He cringes also.
>=20
> Terminion: SECURITY!
>=20
> Danny sighs.
>=20
> Danny: You're under arrest.
>=20
> Junk Man: You mean you're security?
>=20
> Danny: Yes. Don't make me beat you to death with my police club.
>=20
> Junk Man: HAW!
>=20
> Mincer: Hey, you guys are so funny, let's just all party all night=20
long and forget about this!
>=20
> Danny: No.
>=20
> Terminion: We don't even know you guys, nor do we want to. Leave.
>=20
> Junk Man: Let's DANCE!
>=20
> Junk Man and Mincer dance. They dance all over the control panel of=20
the ship.
>=20
> Terminion: We're going down!
>=20
> Danny: NOOOOOO! I don't want to land on Earth, it's too predictable!
>=20
> Their ship goes spiraling downwards. It crashes into the side of a=20
volcano. There the four shall remain in their unconscious states for=20
a million years or so. Except.
>=20
> A squirrel throws an acorn and hits Mincer in the head. He wakes up.
>=20
> Mincer: Ow! How'd that squirrel get in here?
>=20
> He looks at Junk Man.
>=20
> Mincer: ARE YOU AWAKE!?
>=20
> He yelled in his ear. Junk Man is awoken and stares at Mincer.
>=20
> Mincer: Well? Are you awake?
>=20
> Junk Man: yeah. Let's party!
>=20
> They party. The noise wakes up Terminion and Danny.
>=20
> Danny: Guys, I don't know about you, but we wanted to sleep for a=20
million years or so.
>=20
> Terminion: Yeah, prehistoric Earth is the pits... The Pit. Heh.
>=20
> Junk Man: Let's go have fun.
>=20
> The 4 leave the ship and walk along. They just walk, for no=20
apparent reason.
>=20
> Terminion: Let's go this way.
>=20
> He points.
>=20
> Danny: No, let us go this way.
>=20
> Junk Man: That way.
>=20
> He pointed back towards the ship.
>=20
> Mincer: I vote we take Danny's way.
>=20
> And so they do.
>=20
> (Later)
>=20
> They are now walking through a desert.
>=20
> Terminion: Admit it, I was right.
>=20
> Mincer: No, you suck.
>=20
> Terminion: ADMIT IT! ADMIT IT! ADMIT IT! ADMIT IT!
>=20
> Mincer: SHUT UP!
>=20
> An avalanche of sand buries them. oh, and wakes up a monster in a=20
nearby cave.
>=20
> Monster: FEE FI FO FUM! I SMELL FOUR LOSERS!
>=20
> Monster comes lumbering out towards the 4 as they dig themselves=20
out of the sand.
>=20
> Junk Man: Hey, Bigfoot does exist.
>=20
> Monster slobbers. A big thick glob of spit drips from the beast's=20
jaw. Oh, and it lands on Mincer.
>=20
> Mincer: Yuck! Dude, can't you at least spit on Danny for having a=20
stupid name?
>=20
> Danny: Shut up.
>=20
> Monster: Hey, you guys lost?
>=20
> He transforms into a robot. He is stared at by 7 eyes; Junk Man had=20
one eye closed.
>=20
> Terminion: Yes. Yes we are.
>=20
> Monster: Aha! I love giving directions to losers.
>=20
> Mincer: By losers are you referring to Danny?
>=20
> Monster: All of you.
>=20
> Terminion: Just tell us which way out man, how much does it cost?
>=20
> Monster, who was bigger than all four of the guys, stares at the=20
sky.
>=20
> Terminion: Hello?
>=20
> Monster: We gotta go up.
>=20
> Terminion: You can fly?
>=20
> Monster: No.
>=20
> Danny: Excuse me, but are you stupid?
>=20
> Monster: Costs nothing. Follow me.
>=20
> Monster walks along slowly. The other four follow him slowly.
>=20
> Mincer: Walk faster.
>=20
> Monster walks about 1/65 of a mile faster.
>=20
> Junk Man: Anybody want any of this energon?
>=20
> Everyone raises their hands.
>=20
> Junk Man: I'd like some, too.
>=20
> They consider killing and eating Junk Man...


=20

Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/=
=20




Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
ADVERTISEMENT



Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
